content.question: Which of the following most directly motivated enslaved ladinos to participate in the conquest of the Americas?

choices.label: They could return to Africa and win praise within their communities.
They might gain their freedom in return for their participation.
They could fight their European enslavers and incite widespread rebellion.
They might acquire enslaved Indigenous people with their gains.

content.answer: They might gain their freedom in return for their participation.
